item.description:
Leave by 2p and get there by 6p, which should be enough time to get in one pitch, or for the leader to rappel back down, high-five their belayer and then head back to Boston.

We can stop for a good dinner on the way back, maybe Denny's, where you can eat breakfast all day or night, which is pretty cool. Please note - Denny's may not have gluten-free or locally-sourced options.

I can drive. If you can sing along to 70's glam rock and can tolerate cigar smoke you should be fine.

Please no weirdos. Weather is looking great!
item.name: Gunks In a Day
